text: Iris is a 2014 American documentary film directed by Albert Maysles about the life of fashion icon Iris Apfel. It premiered at the 2014 New York Film Festival and was released theatrically the following year. It was released on PBS's POV after its theatrical run. ==External links== * * * *Iris at PBS' POV Category:2014 films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:2014 documentary films Category:American documentary films Category:Films about fashion Category:Films directed by Albert and David Maysles Category:2010s documentary film stubs
title: Iris (2014 film)
